message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but my budget is quite limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly work something out?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To meet you closer to your budget, I could let it go for $17,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I'm still interested in the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $15,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
